pages.text: Vampires are known for their immortality, but this is not entirely true. While they may not be able to die from all normal means, they can still be killed by certain methods or left in a crippled state by $(l:maleficium:introduction/desiccation)desiccation$().

pages.name: Fire
pages.text: Regular vampires can be killed by burning alive via fire or lava.

pages.name: Wooden Sword
pages.text: Regular vampires can be killed/finished off with a wooden sword (pretty much a stake)

pages.name: The Void
pages.text: All vampires can be permanently killed by the void. What else would you expect?
